title: 4-year-old boy accidentally shoots himself inside New Orleans East home
content:
NEW ORLEANS —
A 4-year-old boy is in stable condition after he accidentally shot himself in the neck at a home in New Orleans East, police said.
New Orleans police said the incident was reported Sunday afternoon in the 7300 block of Brevard Street.
The child was at his grandparent's home when he accidentally shot himself. He remains at a hospital in stable condition, the NOPD said.
Detectives are questioning the people who were inside the home. The investigation into the shooting is ongoing.
Stay with WDSU-TV and WDSU.com as updates are released.
